titleStmt.title: An inspective for spirituall ingrossures; being presented to a Presbyterian pluralist, and formalist. / By Thomas Tookey M.A. substituted pastor at Thornhaw in Northamptonshire.
titleStmt.author: Tookey, Thomas, d. 1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: A Presbyterian pluralist, and formalist = John Yaxley.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls.
